name: razor-claw
effect: Held: Raises the holder’s critical hit counter by 1. Held by Sneasel: Evolves the holder into Weavile when it levels up during the night.
short_effect: Held: Raises the holder’s critical hit ratio by one stage. Held by a Sneasel while levelling up at night: Holder evolves into Weavile.

flavor_text.x_y: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This sharply hooked claw increases the holder’s critical-hit ratio.
